page.title: 02LONG LANE SCHOOL
page.content: Long Lane is a C. of E. controlled primary school for children aged 5 - 11. Children have 1/2 time schooling in the term preceding their 5th birthday. The average number of pupils in the 1980's is 33. The staff comprises: Head, Infant teacher, .2 teacher, Welfare assistant (10 hrs/week), Clerical assistant (6 1/2 hrs/week) Cook (30 hrs/week) and Caretaker (14 hrs/week). School hours are 08.55 - 12.05 and 12.15 - 15.35. SELECTION OF EVENTS _ MARCH_APRIL '85. March 8th _ Slides & talk_Haddon Hall. March 20th_ Juniors at Assembly Rooms for a day of Folk dance & Music. ETHIOPIAN FAMINE APPEAL March 1st_ Bring & buy (Â£119), March 4th _ Disco (Â£8), March 22nd _ Bangers 'n' Mash Supper (Â£122). Wing Commander Hall accepted cheque for Â£249 on behalf of Save the Children Famine App
